Milka Chepkorir (amụrụ n'afọ 1990) bụ onye na-amụ banyere ụmụ mmadụ, ihu igwe na ikike mmadụ
A makwaara ọrụ ya mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Sengwer People ndị bi gburugburu Embobut na Kapolet Forest iji chebe ikike ha mgbe Kenya Forest Service (KFS) chụpụrụ ha n'ike.

Chepkorir bụ nke ndị Sengwer si n'ọhịa Kapolet. Ọ bi na Kitale, Kenya. O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Anthropology na Mahadum Maseno Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ na-aga n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya site n'ịga Masters na Gender and Development Studies na Mahadum Nairobi n'okpuru onyinye JHW.
Mgbalị ya malitere mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị. N'agbanyeghị nkea makwaara ọrụ ya mgbe ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị otu UN Human Rights Office Indigenous Fellowship Programme na 2016.

Site na mkpakọrịta a, ọ gara 16th United Nation Permanent Forum on Indigenous Issues na New York ma kọọ enweghị mmejuputa ikike ụmụ amaala site na UN site na ịnọchite anya Forest Peoples Programme, Natural Justice na òtù 20 ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-ekwukwa mmebi iwu nke KFS ebe ha gbara ụlọ ịrị itoolu nke ndị Sengwer ọkụ nke malitere mgbe European Union na ụlọ akụ ụwa na-akwado ha.

Ọ laghachiri na 17th United Nation Permanent Forum on Indigenous Issues na 2018 wee kọọ mmeso ọjọọ nke ụlọọrụ Kenya Forest Service site n'ịchụpụ ndị Sengwer n'ala nna nna ha. Ndị Sengwer na-eche nchụpụ nke sitere na Water Towers Protection na Climate Change Mitigation and Adaptation Programme nke European Union kwadoro
Ọ bụ KFS na nkwupụta Chepkorir mere nchụpụ a:
"Ha kpọọrọ nwa nwoke dị afọ isii wee soro ya gbaa ụlọ ọkụ mgbe nne ya gbapụrụ
Ha hapụrụ naanị ya n'ime ọhịa n'abalị".
N'ịgbaso akụkọ a, EU kwụsịrị ọrụ ahụ.
Ugbu a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi nke Community Land Action NOW! (CLAN), onye nhazi maka nchekwa mpaghara ndụ na onye ndụmọdụ maka ego Agroecology.
